title: Comparative Analysis of Comprehensive Genomic Profile in Thymomas and Recurrent Thymomas Reveals Potentially Actionable Mutations for Target Therapies
content: Conclusions: CGP do not substantially differ between initial tumor vs tumor recurrence and recurrent thymomas vs non-recurrent thymomas. Cell-cycle control genes alterations are associated with an early recurrence after thymectomy. Multiple target therapies are potentially available by performing a comprehensive CGP, suggesting that a precision medicine approach on these patients could be further explored.
